title: Geometric Distribution
text: To find the probability, you can use a geometric PDF distribution function on a graphing calculator.

title: Geometric Distribution
text: When using the calculator, set the $$p$$ to $$0.02$$, and the X value to $$7$$, since we want to find the probability that the FIRST defect is caused by the seventh component tested.
